result.arabic_text: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
result.translation: 23. Kaadu woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) jahannam bahsimah, too ayró seehadayti iimaan kee meqe taamay addunyal cinak suge kassitah, woo kassit kee nadaama mannal tu kaah xiqtaa?
